answers.answer: Each pregnancy is different.  I am now 25 weeks 3 days and just starting to show.  I have maintained a strict healthy diet because of my diabetes to ensure my developing sons health.  It al depends on your body.  My sister is also pregnant (she is at 16 weeks) & she looks as if she is due to pop any day!
I started to show at 16 weeks, and I'm not 20 weeks and everyone can tell I'm pregnant. It just depends.
I started showing the tiniest bit at around 15 or 16 weeks. It wasn't till around 18-19 when others started to notice :)
First pregnancy I didn't show till about 7 months. This one I'm 15w and showing. Each one is different :)
Everyone tells me I'm showing and I'm nine weeks and five days.
I finally have a little baby bump at 16wks. But I don't think it's suppose to be hard until toward the end. I can be wrong since this is my first also.
Okay thank you guys :) good luck to you all! Xx
I started showing at around 4 1/2 months and there are times that it is hard but other times its not so hard.   I think every person is different.

With my first pregnancy i started showing around 15 weeks like she wanted everyone to notice me. She is 17 months now and im 14 weeks pregnant today and everyone think im further along than what i am. I guess just depending on ur body.

question: Soo I'm exactly 9 weeks today,and I was wondering when my stomache will start feeling hard? And showing a little?
title: Answers pleasee!
